Articles.Content:
Your asteroid gets kidnapped and killed by Planetary Resources.

My platin.

I will you all and restart the universe.

My hill.
No. Mine. I also build up arms to prevent nooby interventions like this one.

I construct a hill out of anti-matter.

My anti-hill.

I drop some normal matter on your anti-matter hill. 

My nothing!

I initiate a mini big bang and create a new hill.

My hill

I do a Big Bang III.

My hill.
I reject the theory. King of the hill!

I kill you and take your hill.

My hill.
I tear you limb from limb and claim the hill as mine. I then impale your body parts on spikes and scatter them around the hill.
I get North Korea to launch a rocket next to you. Obviously, I become King of the Hill.
I declare one half to be the Democratic Republic of North Hill Korea with me as dict... president. The other half is now our test range and you *accidentally* die in bullet rain.
I arrange your disgruntled citizens into and army and lead a revolution.

------------

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-01T09:02:32Z" title="08/01/2018 09:02  AM" data-short="5 yr">August 1, 2018</time> by flying\_chair**

~

I'm George Lucas and edit that part out to make it "better"

My motion picture hill.

I am James cameron and make the titanic visit there, claiming that hill.

My titanicy hill.

EDIT: That was quite a Necro! ![:o](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_ohmy.png)

I slam a gigantic house ontop of the hill, killing everyone except me and I claim my house and hill.

My homely hill.

I slam a bomb on top of that house, and its destroyed.

My debriely hill.

I build my own hill on top of your hill, now it is a mountain. Your hill has been crushed

My mountain.
